root.sql: SELECT TABLE_NAME, COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE OWNER = '{{owner}}' {{#tableName}} AND (TABLE_NAME = '{{tableName}}' OR COMMENTS LIKE '%' || '{{tableName}}' || '%') {{/tableName}}

SELECT A.TABLE_NAME, A.COLUMN_NAME, C.COMMENTS, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LENGTH FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A JOIN ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B ON A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME JOIN ALL_COL_COMMENTS C ON A.OWNER = C.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.OWNER = '{{owner}}' {{#tableName}} AND (A.TABLE_NAME = '{{tableName}}' OR B.COMMENTS LIKE '%' || '{{tableName}}' || '%') {{/tableName}} {{#columnName}} AND (C.COLUMN_NAME = '{{columnName}}' OR C.COMMENTS LIKE '%' || '{{columnName}}' || '%') {{/columnName}} ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME, A.COLUMN_ID ASC

SELECT A.COLUMN_NAME AS INDEX_COLUMN FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A JOIN ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B ON A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME JOIN ALL_COL_COMMENTS C ON A.OWNER = C.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME JOIN ALL_IND_COLUMNS D ON A.OWNER = D.TABLE_OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = D.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = D.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.OWNER = '{{owner}}' AND A.TABLE_NAME = '{{tableName}}' GROUP BY A.COLUMN_NAME, A.COLUMN_ID ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID ASC
